title: Historic City Stay Close to German Christmas Markets
description: Escape to the German city of Nuremberg - known for its medieval architecture, fascinating past and spectacular Christmas market that attracts travellers from around the world. In the midst of this exciting city, you’ll find the high-end Le Meridien Grand Hotel Nuremberg - a five-star oasis in the heart of the city. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, welcome drinks for two on arrival, daily coffee and complimentary tickets to the nearby Neues Museum.
